alert.note: Alert for City of Buena Vista (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 12:29AM EST until January 11 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of Rockbridge County in southwest Virginia and the independent cities of Buena Vista and Lexington. * WHEN...Until 700 AM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1226 AM EST, Local law enforcement reported that several roads remain closed throughout Rockbridge County due to flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Lexington, Buena Vista, Glasgow, Goshen, Rockbridge Baths, Collierstown and Cornwall. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
